model.structures

Interface SocietyModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StateModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSocietyModel

    public interface SocietyModel
extends StateModel
    This interface represents a society model of the PPAL logic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SocietyModel clone()
      Clones this society.
      java.util.Set<State> getNeighbourStates(Society society, State state)
      Set of states connected to a given state by edges of a given society.
      void insertEdge(Society society, State s1, State s2)
      Inserts a bidirectional edge connecting state s1 and state s2.
      void replaceSociety(Society oldSociety, Society newSociety)
      To be used after cloning to replace the old society for a new one.
      void trimEdges(Society society, Evaluable ev)
      Removes all non-ev edges from the model.

      • Methods inherited from interface model.structures.StateModel

        getStates

    • Method Detail

      • getNeighbourStates

        java.util.Set<State> getNeighbourStates(Society society,
                                        State state)
        Set of states connected to a given state by edges of a given society.
        Parameters:
        society - Edges representing this society will be considered.
        state - Neighbours of this state will be fetched.
        Returns:
        Set of neighbour states.

      • insertEdge

        void insertEdge(Society society,
                State s1,
                State s2)
        Inserts a bidirectional edge connecting state s1 and state s2.
        Parameters:
        society - Edge representing this society will be created.
        s1 - One of the extremes of the edge.
        s2 - Another extreme of the edge.

      • trimEdges

        void trimEdges(Society society,
               Evaluable ev)
        Removes all non-ev edges from the model.
        Parameters:
        society - Society whose edges will be trimmed.
        ev - Evaluable to check for the non-ev edges.

      • clone

        SocietyModel clone()
        Clones this society.
        Returns:
        A clone of this society.

      • replaceSociety

        void replaceSociety(Society oldSociety,
                    Society newSociety)
        To be used after cloning to replace the old society for a new one.
        Parameters:
        oldSociety - Original society.
        newSociety - New society.
